A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you like a slow moving\, horribly paced\, space ship chase this film is for you! Unfortunately that's not the Star Wars I think many fans were looking for. So many of the choices made in this film were just poor.  From Luke's character choices\, Finn and Rose's pointless sub-plot\, flying Leia\, to completely dismantling the story arch started by J.J. Abrams\, this film completely missed the mark.
